name: Ducks and bunnies
description:
Ducks and bunnies is a retro bullet hell where you play as a duck who has to stop the evil bunnies from destroying the park! Meet other animals along the way that will help you on your journey and have fun shooting bunnies!

Controls: 
  • WASD to move
  • E to interact
  • Left-click to shoot
  • Right-click to fly
  • R to restart to nest
  • enter to pause
music:
